[DQC.US.0150.9878] The disclosure 400300 - Disclosure - SEGMENT INFORMATION (SEGMENT FINANCIALS) (Details) includes the concept us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax with a value of 3,000 and the dimension of srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:IntersegmentEliminationMember. This same line item however was used to report the value of 471,523,000 for a busines segment axis with the dimensions of us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=ttec:TtecDigitalMember, but with no associated operating member. If a value is reported for a segment then an operating member should be used if there are reconciling items for that line item.
Concept : us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax Value : 471,523,000 Total period : 2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=ttec:TtecDigitalMember Decimals : -3
